BakeryContent.BakedGoodDescription: Let’s celebrate your birthday! Whether it's your friend's birthday, family, your significant other or even a coworker or your boss, Mary's Bakery has you covered! Click on the More Info link to learn more!

BakeryContent.BakedGoodDescription: Kids' birthdays are always fun and festive! Here at Mary's Bakery, we specialize in several kid's themes. We hope to make their birthday cakes stand out and have kids excited to eat cake! Click on the More Info link to learn more!

BakeryContent.BakedGoodDescription: Happy Sweet 16/Quince Años! This is a very special day in a young girl's life where it's not just any birthday, it's a birthday where it's celebrating a transition from a girlhood to womanhood! To make this day special for your loved one, we give several cake options. Click on the More Info link to learn more!

BakeryContent.BakedGoodDescription: Here comes the bride and groom! One of the most special days in a couple's life to unite in marriage. It's a day to celebrate a lifetime of love, life, and happiness. Followed by a wedding comes a wedding reception where the couple celebrates with their loved ones. At Mary's Bakery, we offer a numerous amount of options to celebrate your wedding day. Click on the More Info link to learn more!
